description:
Cuddly Sensitive Concentrated Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner 1L 40 Washes is Made in Australia. Gentle on Sensitive Skin, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist Tested and is a Sensitive Choice Proud Supporter of the Eczema Association Australasia Inc. Designed for Luxurious Softness, Easy Iron, Reduces wrinkles, Reduces Static, Helps clothes look newer for longer and is Fast Drying.

Cuddly Concentrate Hypoallergenic Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner is gentle on sensitive skin.

Delicate skin needs the gentlest touch which is why we've formulated Cuddly Sensitive. It's hypoallergenic, has been dermatologically tested and contains no dyes.

Cuddly Sensitive gives that little bit extra to show you care.

- Luxurious Softness
- Gentle Fragrance
- Hypoallergenic
- Dermatologically tested
- Free from dyes
- Sensitive Choice
- Proud supporter of the Eczema Association Australasia (EAA)
- Grey Water and Septic Tank safe
- 100% recyclable packaging

Directions for use
Top Loader - Cuddly can be added to your machine's fabric conditioner dispensing unit or diluted and added to the final rinse.
Front Loader - Add Cuddly to your machine's fabric conditioner dispenser unit only. This is often marked with a flower.

Cuddly is ready to use so there is no need to dilute. Never pour directly onto fabrics.

Size: 1L Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner Concentrate
Washes: 40 washes

FABRIC SOFTENER CONDITIONER: Cuddly Concentrate Sensitive Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner is gentle on sensitive skin

HYPOALLERGENIC AND DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: Cuddly Concentrate Sensitive fabric conditioner is hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested.

DELICATE ON SENSITIVE SKIN: Cuddly Sensitive fabric conditioner is a Sensitive Choice, Proud supporter of Eczema Association Australasia Inc

FREE FROM: any dyes and has a gentle fragrance
name: Cuddly Concentrate Fabric Conditioner Hypoallergenic Sensitive 1L
